snippet: Howard Dodson, who assessed the condition of the Howard University library system as a consultant, is working to address its problems in his role as director of the main libraries.
abstract: Howard Dodson, new director of undergraduate and graduate libraries at Howard University, hopes to refurbish its neglected Moorland-Spingarn Research Center, which is one of the world’s largest collections devoted to the history and culture of people of African descent.
lead_paragraph: Howard Dodson, who assessed the condition of the Howard University library system as a consultant, is working to address its problems in his role as director of the main libraries.

headline.seo: A Plan for Howard University’s Moorland-Spingarn Center
